event.title: George W. Bush's First Term Begins
Democrats gain narrow control of Senate after James Jeffords defects from the Republican Party
September 11, 2001 Terrorist Attacks on the World Trade Center and The Pentagon
U.S. withdraws from Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty
Republicans retake narrow control of Senate following 2002 elections
Invasion of Iraq - Operation 'Iraqi Freedom' commences
George W. Bush's Second Term Begins
Hurricane Katrina became the costliest hurricane of all time
Democrats retake control of both houses of Congress
Gen. Petraeus Testifies to Congress on Iraq Surge
Guest appearance on network game show 'Deal or No Deal'
USA general election; Barack Obama defeats John McCain
